data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Sulawesi Tengah, Indonesia.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sulawesi Tengah, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 2,635,000 people living in Sulawesi Tengah through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Sulawesi Tengah.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Sulawesi Tengah that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Topoiyo people might believe through him.
Lord, teach the young people in the state of Sulawesi Tengah to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Sulawesi Tengah, Indonesia, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Father, help the 84,542 believers in Sulawesi Tengah to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 2,550,459 lost friends and neighbors.

location.name: Sulawesi Tengah
location.people_groups_list: Gorontalo, Tomadino, Mamuju, Andio, Kaili Ledo
